channel.title: Illusionist Buff
channel.description: With the new Noble incoming, I feel like Illusionist needs a buff/rework(she's been needing one for a while now anyway). So, my proposed suggestion is to give Illusionist unlimited uses of Conduit and a passive to allow her to use both night abilities at once, making BD have to be more wary of Conduits and giving Illusionist a slightly easier time fake claiming.

item.title: Illusionist Buff
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
I suggest that mental blur cleans both chat history and logs to make it a lot stronger. That way, people have no way to catch up on the chat they now miss. This could be used in conjunction with the assassin to give BD no logs information. So mental blur occurs before being killed. The argument could be made that private notes solves the former a bit, but that argument could also be made for the chat disappearing or people writing it in a third party program or copying all the chats there for instance.

item.title: Illusionist Buff
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
The Illusionist

Unseen Social
Telepathy (Day) - Anonymously send a single message to the chat. - 2 uses
Channel (Night) - Your two targets will both be able to communicate over the course of the night. You may target yourself - if you do not, you will be able to listen in but not speak. - Infinite Uses
Construct Reality (Night) - Your target will receive incorrect feedback from their abilities tonight, and will appear to be the Assassin to any investigations. - Infinite Uses
Your objective is to Eliminate the Blue Dragon and any Neutrals who stand against you

item.description:
Infinite Uses of Conducts?
I’m not sure about that. If you want stick to Mystic claim after conversion, you’re probably aware of that someone would ask to use “Link” instead of “Conduct”, which is a dead giveaway since you can’t confirm yourself. Obviously “Mental Blur” need replacement but i would think about somethin’ else.
